content.raw:
Very nice!

The red/green buoys have the buoyancy plugin attached so that they automatically move the water height and collisions are a little more realistic.  Next time we meet we should discuss if this is worth the effort and additional processing cycles.

‌

‌

Very nice!

The red/green buoys have the buoyancy plugin attached so that they automatically move the water height and collisions are a little more realistic. Next time we meet we should discuss if this is worth the effort and additional processing cycles.
